date.description: The date for which the analytics data is recorded

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube channel

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube video

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates if the views are from live or on-demand content

subscribed_status.description: Indicates the subscription status of viewers (subscribed or not subscribed)

country_code.description: The country code representing the location of the traffic source

traffic_source_type.description: The type of traffic source (e.g., External, YouTube search)

traffic_source_detail.description: Specific details about the traffic source

views.description: The total number of views from the traffic source

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes for the traffic source

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average view duration in seconds for the given traffic source

average_view_duration_percentage.description: The percentage of the average view duration for the given traffic source

red_views.description: The number of views from returning viewers

red_watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes from returning viewers
